title: Top 5 Tips for Healthy Houseplants
content: Water deeply but less frequently. Keep plants near indirect sunlight. Use well-draining soil. Dust leaves regularly. Repot when roots outgrow the pot.

title: Best Indoor Plants for Beginners
content: Snake Plant, Pothos, ZZ Plant, Spider Plant, Peace Lily — easy to grow and hard to kill!

title: How to Revive a Dying Plant
content: Check root health. Adjust light and watering. Remove dead leaves. Repot if needed. Use diluted fertilizer.

title: Seasonal Plant Care Checklist – Spring Edition
content: Prune dead branches. Start fertilizing again. Repot if root-bound. Watch for new growth. Increase watering gradually.
